subject: Re: Debian GNU/Linux (kfreebsd anyone?) Lenny Desktop wishlist thread
body:
Gustavo Franco wrote:
> Would you like to join us at debian-desktop alioth group?

same answer as the last time you have asked me. what would it be good
for? i'm only remotly a desktop user, and certainly not a desktop developer.

> I heard from Sledge that after Etch
> release (in place) he (or we) could work on add some established Live
> images to cdimage.d.o and announce it through DWN, -news and
> times.debian.net (The idea was proposed in -publicity). Thoughts?

i know. as soon as we consider live-helper (which is rotting in NEW) as
ready, i'll coordinate this. ETA is about 2 to 4 weeks from now.

> Btw, what's the needed work to integrate d-i gtk and/or ubiquity in
> the live desktop images for Lenny ?

d-i and g-i on the same images, in terms of seperate boot option are
ready soon. in terms of 'launch d-i/g-i from a booted live-system as an
application', this requires, as far as i'm told, that the d-i people
provides special builds for that purpose.

for the 'live-to-hdd' installation, we will most likely write something
on your own. plan is to have it done until mid of july.

and well, lenny is far, far away...

> In other words
> they can boot the live desktop image and install a dns server through
> its task.

i don't understand what you mean here.

--
